title: "Thought It Was A Rusty Bolt": 13-Year-Old Stumbles Upon Roman-Era Ring
content: The ring, preserved in its entirety, features the image of a helmeted naked figure holding a shield in one hand and a spear in the other.
summary: The ring, preserved in its entirety, features the image of a helmeted naked figure holding a shield in one hand and a spear in the other.

title: US Presidential Election 2024 And Its Double India Connection

title: How A Small-Town Kannadiga Brought India Its 1st Miss Universe Petite Crown
content: Imagine doing a 36-hour shift in a hospital and then turning up willingly the next day to chip away the imperfections to become a beauty queen? That is what Shruti Hegde, a doctor and a beauty queen from Hubli, Karnataka, has been doing since 2018.

title: Prince Harry, Meghan Markle Break 64-Year Royal Tradition In Surprise Move
content: In a significant departure from tradition, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have changed the surnames of their children. Recently, the couple launched its new website, sussex.com, where many noticed the change, the Mirror reported.

title: "I Divorce You... Your Ex-Wife": Dubai Princess Dumps Husband In Insta Post

title: Acropolis In Athens Shut For Several Hours Daily. Heat Is The Reason

title: Women Shouldn't Be In Secret Service, Says US Right Wing Post Trump Shooting

title: "This Is The Final Straw": Elon Musk Moving X And SpaceX Out Of California

title: Sikh Republican Faces Backlash After Leading Prayers At Party Convention
content: Sikh Republican Harmeet Dhillon delivered a prayer at the Republican National Convention (RNC).Ms Dhillon, a religious-liberty lawyer and former Trump campaign adviser, told the Milwaukee audience that she comes from a family of Sikh immigrants.
